兵学: (へいがく) - military science; strategy; tactics
兵庫曲: (ひょうごわげ) - female hairstyle starting from the Keicho period
兵庫県: (ひょうごけん) - Hyogo prefecture (Kinki area) (Hyougo)
兵庫髷: (ひょうごわげ) - female hairstyle starting from the Keicho period
兵式体操: (へいしきたいそう) - military drill
兵役免状: (へいえきめんじょう) - draft exemption; exemption from conscription
兵役忌避: (へいえききひ) - evading the draft; evading the draught
兵役法: (へいえきほう) - Military Service Law (1927-1945)
兵役逃れ: (へいえきのがれ) - evading military service; draft dodging; draft evasion
兵書: (へいしょ) - book on military science
兵曹長: (へいそうちょう) - (Japanese Imperial Navy) chief warrant-officer
兵法: (ひょうほう) - art of war; strategy; tactics
兵法指南: (へいほうしなん) - (yoji) instruction in martial arts
兵法者: (へいほうしゃ) - tactician/strategist; master swordsman
兵燹: (へいせん) - fire caused by war
兵種: (へいしゅ) - branch of an army
兵站線: (へいたんせん) - supply line; line of communications
兵端: (へいたん) - hostilities; beginning of hostilities
兵術: (へいじゅつ) - the art of war; strategy; tactics
兵衛: (ひょうえい) - middle palace guard (ritsuryo system)
兵農分離: (へいのうぶんり) - separation of farmers and samurai (system in effect from the Azuchi-Momoyama period until the Edo period)
兵鋒: (へいほう) - the point of a sword; the advance of an army
兵長: (へいちょう) - former rank in the Japanese army and navy, equiv. to private first-class, lance corporal, etc.
兵隊人形: (へいたいにんぎょう) - toy soldier; soldier figurine
兵隊勘定: (へいたいかんじょう) - (yoji) Dutch treat; going Dutch
兵食: (へいしょく) - food for soldiers and noncommissioned officers
兵馬: (へいば) - arms and cavalry; troops; war; military affairs
兵馬の権: (へいばのけん) - supreme military power
兵馬俑: (へいばよう) - terracotta army (clay figurines found near the mausoleum of the first Qin emperor in China); terracotta warriors and horses
其の: (その) - that (something or someone distant from the speaker, close to the listener; actions of the listener, or ideas expressed or understood by the listener)/the; um.../er.../uh...
其のまま: (そのまま) - without change; as it is (i.e. now)
其の上: (そのかみ) - a long time ago; in those days; once upon a time
其の事: (そのこと) - that; the matter in question
其の他: (そのた) - (そのた is more the written form) etc.; otherwise; besides; in addition; the rest; the others; and so forth
其の儘: (そのまんま) - without change; as it is (i.e. now)
其の先: (そのさき) - beyond that point; after that
其の内: (そのうち) - before very long; soon; eventually; sooner or later; of the previously mentioned
其の分: (そのぶん) - to that extent; accordingly/that being the case/because of that/this means that ...; that state/that condition
其の場: (そのば) - there/that situation/that occasion; the spot (i.e. "on the spot")/immediately/then and there
其の場凌ぎ: (そのばしのぎ) - stopgap; makeshift; temporary measure
其の場限り: (そのばかぎり) - temporary; ad hoc
其の後: (そののち) - after that; afterwards; thereafter
其の手は食わない: (そのてはくわない) - I am not going to fall for that trick; that trick won't work on me
其の折: (そのおり) - on that occasion; at that time
其の方: (そのほう) - you (referring to one's inferior)
其の日: (そのひ) - that day; the very same day
其の日暮し: (そのひぐらし) - financially scraping by/meagre existence (meager)/hand to mouth existence; living one's life without plan/living life day-by-day/taking life one day at a time
其の日暮らし: (そのひぐらし) - financially scraping by/meagre existence (meager)/hand to mouth existence; living one's life without plan/living life day-by-day/taking life one day at a time
其の昔: (そのむかし) - a long time ago; in those days
其の時は其の時: (そのときはそのとき) - We'll think about it when the time comes
其の晩: (そのばん) - that night/that evening; over the course of the evening
其の為: (そのため) - hence; for that reason
其の物: (そのもの) - the very thing; itself
其の癖: (そのくせ) - and yet; even so; nonetheless; for all that
